\usepackage[empty]{fullpage} % use full page. remove header and footer
\usepackage{enumitem} % add list functionality
\usepackage{marvosym} % add euro symbol â‚¬
\usepackage{tabularx} % create columns
\usepackage{array}
\usepackage[hidelinks]{hyperref} % remove hyperlink color and borders

\usepackage{ragged2e}

\usepackage{geometry} % Required for adjusting page dimensions and margins

\geometry{
	paper=letterpaper, % Paper size, change to letterpaper for US letter size
	top=0.5in, % Top margin
	bottom=0.5in, % Bottom margin
	left=0.5in, % Left margin
	right=.8in, % Right margin
	headheight=0.75cm, % Header height
	footskip=1cm, % Space from the bottom margin to the baseline of the footer
	headsep=0.5cm, % Space from the top margin to the baseline of the header
	%showframe, % Uncomment to show how the type block is set on the page
}

\def\Vhrulefill{\leavevmode\leaders\hrule height 0.7ex depth \dimexpr 0.4pt-0.7ex\hfill\kern0pt}

% Command to output section title headings
\newcommand{\sect}[1]{% The only parameter is the section text
	\vspace{1ex} % Whitespace before the section title
	{\large\textbf{#1}} \hspace{4pt} \Vhrulefill \\ %Section title
\vspace{-5pt}}

\newcommand{\resitem}[1]{\item[$\bullet$] #1 \vspace{-2pt}}
\newcommand{\resitemnobullet}[1]{\item[] #1 \vspace{-2pt}}

\newcommand{\ressubheadingA}[4]{
\vspace{-1ex}\begin{tabular*}{7.108in}{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
		\textbf{#1} & #2 \\
		\textit{#3} & \textit{#4} \\
\end{tabular*}\vspace{-4pt}}

\newcommand{\ressubheadingB}[2]{
\vspace{-1ex}\begin{tabular*}{7.108in}{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r}
		\textbf{#1} & \textit{#2} \\
\end{tabular*}\vspace{-4pt}}

\newcommand{\ressubheadingC}[1]{
\vspace{-1ex}\begin{tabular*}{6.9in}{ll}
		#1 \\
\end{tabular*}\vspace{-4pt}}

\newcolumntype{L}{>{\raggedright\arraybackslash}X} % Left-aligned
\newcolumntype{C}{>{\centering\arraybackslash}X}   % Center-aligned
\newcolumntype{R}{>{\raggedleft\arraybackslash}X}  % Right-aligned

\newcommand{\ressubheadingD}[4]{
\vspace{-1ex}\hspace{-1ex}\begin{tabularx}{7.12in}{L C C R}
		#1 & #2 & #3 & #4 \\
\end{tabularx}\vspace{-4pt}}

\newcommand{\ressubheadingE}[1]{
\vspace{-1ex}\hspace{-1ex}\begin{tabularx}{7.12in}{C}
		\textbf{\Large{#1}} \\
\end{tabularx}\vspace{12pt}}

\renewcommand\labelitemi{$\vcenter{\hbox{\large$\bullet$}}$}

\sect{Projects}
\begin{itemize}[left=0pt]
    \item[] 
        \ressubheadingB{Laser-Controlled Arcade Shooting Game}{Sept 2023 -- Dec 2023}
        \begin{itemize}
            \resitem{Created laser-cut components using AutoCAD under tight deadlines, including a custom-designed laser pistol with internal wiring and a trigger mechanism}
            \resitem{Proposed and fabricated design features such as servo actuated moving photoresistor targets with diverse difficulty-adjusted behaviors}
            \resitem{Collaborated with teammates to meet project milestones and maintain the project timeline, including implementing project management tools like a Gantt chart, work schedule, and fishbone diagrams}
        \end{itemize} \vspace{2pt}
    \item[] 
        \ressubheadingB{\href{https://sites.google.com/view/aldernadon-portfolio/projects/rc-model-strandbeest?authuser=0}{Radio-Controlled Strandbeest Walker}}{Jan 2023 -- May 2023}
        \begin{itemize}
            \resitem{Designed a remote controlled walking acrylic kinetic sculpture based off proportioned linkages}
            \resitem{Simulated linkage joints with a motion study in Fusion 360 to examine gait and to design drivetrain}
            \resitem{Laser cut and assembled 300+ custom acrylic parts across 12 gait components}
            \resitem{Evaluated the walking and turning performance over different terrain types}
        \end{itemize} \vspace{2pt}
    \item[] 
        \ressubheadingB{\href{https://sites.google.com/view/aldernadon-portfolio/projects/prompt-engineering-research?authuser=0}{Prompt Engineering for Diversity in Stable Diffusion}}{Oct 2022 -- May 2023}
        \begin{itemize}
            \resitem{Designed a unique methodology to evaluate the creative potential for text prompts in text-to-image generative models (Stable Diffusion)}
            \resitem{Applied engineering methodologies in quantitative analysis of over 9600 images using a perceptual similarity metric Python program for high-volume data analysis}
            \resitem{Summarized findings in an in-depth research paper with exploration of scholarly body of knowledge, methodologies, and data analysis}
        \end{itemize}
    
\end{itemize}
